channel.title: Hiring Coder! Great Pay! Full time! Paid Daily/Weekly/Bi-Weekly
channel.description:
[317 Coder Needed Still]
Hey, I am going to be making a server with my real life buddy and we would love to hire a great coder. As we do not know java we want to bring a opportunity to 1-2 persons to help code for our server. We currently do not have it up yet nor have a VPS yet I will be getting a good vps not a crappy one by next saturday.
Basically we know that being a coder is hard work and time consuming so we are going to be fair with you and offer you a pretty decent pay PER UPDATE or fix of a bug/glitch/dupe. Also you get 1 10th of donations.
Coder is expected to...
Maintain the server, fixing bugs/glitches/dupes. Getting input from players. Doing multiple updates weekly. (You get paid per update you do) 1/10 of all donations you will receive $10 out of $100. Along with your paid updates.
You will have a special rank given along with any rights you wish to have. No trading on your main account, You can have 1 of each major vote/pvp shop items on your secondary account.
Prices I pay (may be more or less but this is a average)
Fix a Bug/Glitch = $2-8 Fix a Dupe = $2-10 Edit Npc attacks/styles/drops/ETC. = $5.00 PER DAY. Add a Minigame = $10-75. Add Vote System (MUST BE GOOD!) = $25.00 Add a Dung Minigame = $10-75. Add Nex FULL = $35.00 Contact me ONLY by email.... rohrer5a@yahoo.com After that I EXPECT you to have a better way on how to reach you ASAP always. Names Austin. Thanks!

item.title: Hiring Coder! Great Pay! Full time! Paid Daily/Weekly/Bi-Weekly
item.dc:creator: @Sheikyy Sheikyy
item.description:
@Sheikyy wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:5, topic:435571”]…so you want to pay people to create a server based upon your needs, then call it yours?

[quote author=Elfbow link=topic=538291.msg3938848#msg3938848 date=1331254650]

Here’s a new Subject for you:

NO paying, and wrong section. This belongs in development teams.

NO paying!

[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Hiring Coder! Great Pay! Full time! Paid Daily/Weekly/Bi-Weekly
